Package org.ejbca.core.model.approval.profile

Interface ApprovalProfile

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Comparable<ApprovalProfile>, Profile, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumulativeApprovalProfile, ApprovalProfileBase, PartitionedApprovalProfile
    public interface ApprovalProfile
extends Profile, Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<ApprovalProfile>
    An interface for approval profiles types.
    Version:
    $Id: ApprovalProfile.java 29563 2018-08-03 14:08:16Z samuellb $

      ApprovalStep getStepBeingEvaluated​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed)
      Returns the first step which hasn't been fully evaluated by the given collection of approvals, or null if all steps have been evaluated.

      Retrieve a list of all steps which must be completed before an approval request is approved.

    • Method Detail

      • getApprovalProfileLabel

        String getApprovalProfileLabel()
        Returns:
        the type as a human readable name.

      • getApprovalProfileTypeIdentifier

        String getApprovalProfileTypeIdentifier()
        Returns an identifier for the type of the approval profile.
        Returns:
        type of approval, e.g. "PARTITIONED_APPROVAL"

        Parameters:
        maxExtensionTime - long
        See Also:
        getMaxExtensionTime()

      • clone

        ApprovalProfile clone()
        Clone has to be implemented instead of a copy constructor due to the fact that we'll be referring to implementations by this interface only.
        Returns:
        a deep copied clone of this profile

      • isApprovalRequired

        boolean isApprovalRequired()
        Method to give an approval implementation a chance to skip out if it's not configured to perform any actions.
        Returns:
        true if approval is relevant and should be used.

      • getAllowSelfEdit

        boolean getAllowSelfEdit()
        Returns:
        true if an administrator is able to approve a request after editing it, without approval from an additional administrator.

      • setAllowSelfEdit

        void setAllowSelfEdit​(boolean allowSelfEdit)
        Parameters:
        allowSelfEdit - an administrator should be able to approve a request after editing it, without approval from an additional administrator

      • canApprovalExecute

        boolean canApprovalExecute​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed)
                    throws ApprovalException,
                           AuthenticationFailedException
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - a Collection of approvals already performed.
        Returns:
        true if this approval profile's criteria are fulfilled, allowing the approval to pass
        Throws:
        ApprovalException - if approval fails
        AuthenticationFailedException - if any of the authentication tokens in the approval collection were faulty

      • getRemainingApprovals

        int getRemainingApprovals​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed)
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - the approvals performed against this profile
        Returns:
        the number of remaining approvals, or -1 if any approval is denied

      • isStepSizeFixed

        boolean isStepSizeFixed()
        Returns:
        true if the amount of sequences of this profile is fixed, false if it's dynamic

      • arePartitionsFixed

        boolean arePartitionsFixed()
        Returns:
        true if it's possible to add fields to the partitions of this profile

      • getSteps

        Map<Integer,​ApprovalStep> getSteps()

      • addStep

        void addStep​(ApprovalStep step)
        Adds a step without modifying any order. Without setting order, this step will not be handled.
        Parameters:
        step - an ApprovalStep

      • addStepFirst

        ApprovalStep addStepFirst()
        Creates a new step and adds it first.
        Returns:
        the new step

      • addStepLast

        ApprovalStep addStepLast()
        Creates a new step and adds it last.
        Returns:
        the new step

      • deleteStep

        void deleteStep​(int approvalStepIdentifier)
        Deletes a step and attaches the steps before and after to each other in order.
        Parameters:
        approvalStepIdentifier - the identifier of the approval step

      • setSteps

        void setSteps​(Map<Integer,​ApprovalStep> steps)

      • switchStepOrder

        void switchStepOrder​(Integer firstStepIdentifier,
                     Integer secondStepIdentifier)
        Switches position betwen two steps
        Parameters:
        firstStepIdentifier - the ID of the first step
        secondStepIdentifier - the ID of the second step

      • addPropertyToPartition

        void addPropertyToPartition​(int stepId,
                            int partitionId,
                            DynamicUiProperty<? extends Serializable> property)
                     throws NoSuchApprovalStepException
        Adds a property to a specific partition in a specific sequence in this approval profile, for display in the UI. If the property already exists, it will be overwritten
        Parameters:
        stepId - the identifier of the step
        partitionId - the ID of a partition in the step
        property - a DynamicUiProperty
        Throws:
        NoSuchApprovalStepException - if the step specified by stepId wasn't found.

      • removePropertyFromPartition

        void removePropertyFromPartition​(int stepId,
                                 int partitionId,
                                 String propertyName)
        Removes a property from a partition. Will do nothing if property was predefined in the template.
        Parameters:
        stepId - the identifier of the step
        partitionId - the ID of a partition in the step
        propertyName - the name of the property.

      • addPartition

        ApprovalPartition addPartition​(int stepIdentifier)
        Adds a partition to this sequence
        Parameters:
        stepIdentifier - the identifier of the sequence
        Returns:
        the partition, with a generated ID

      • addPropertiesToPartition

        void addPropertiesToPartition​(Integer stepId,
                              int partitionId,
                              Collection<DynamicUiProperty<? extends Serializable>> properties)
                       throws NoSuchApprovalStepException
        Parameters:
        stepId - the identifier of the step
        partitionId - the ID of a partition in the step
        properties - a list of DynamicUiProperties
        Throws:
        NoSuchApprovalStepException - if the step identified by stepId didn't exist

        void setFirstStep​(int firstStep)
        Identifier of the sequence to read first.
        Parameters:
        firstStep - step

        ApprovalStep getStep​(Integer identifier)
        Parameters:
        identifier - a step identifier
        Returns:
        the sequence with the given identifier, or null if not found.

                     int partitionIdentifier)
        Deletes a partition from a step
        Parameters:
        approvalStepIdentifier - the ID of the step
        partitionIdentifier - the ID of the partition

      • isApprovalAuthorized

        boolean isApprovalAuthorized​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed,
                             Approval approval)
                      throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Returns true if the approval is authorized for the step and partition it covers, and that all preceding steps are satisfied.
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - the already registered approvals
        approval - the new approval
        Returns:
        true if the given approval is authorized
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication token in the approval wasn't valid

      • getNumberOfSteps

        int getNumberOfSteps()
        Returns:
        the number of steps in this profile

      • getOrdinalOfStepBeingEvaluated

        int getOrdinalOfStepBeingEvaluated​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed)
                            throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - a list of performed approvals
        Returns:
        the ordinal of the step currently being evaluated, given the performed approvals
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication of the approvals failed

      • getStepBeingEvaluated

        ApprovalStep getStepBeingEvaluated​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed)
                            throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Returns the first step which hasn't been fully evaluated by the given collection of approvals, or null if all steps have been evaluated.
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - approvalsPerformed a list of performed approvals
        Returns:
        the step currently being evaluated, given the performed approvals, or null if all steps have been evaluated.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication of the approvals failed

      • canApprovePartition

        boolean canApprovePartition​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                            ApprovalPartition approvalPartition)
                     throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Tests if an administrator can approve a particular partition
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - an authentication token
        approvalPartition - an approval partition from an approval step
        Returns:
        true if administrator has approval rights
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication token in the approval doesn't check out

      • canViewPartition

        boolean canViewPartition​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                         ApprovalPartition approvalPartition)
                  throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Tests if an administrator can view a particular partition. Approval rights automatically count as view rights.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - an authentication token
        approvalPartition - an approval partition from an approval step
        Returns:
        true if administrator has view or approval rights
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - if the authentication token in the approval doesn't check out

      • canAnyoneApprovePartition

        boolean canAnyoneApprovePartition​(ApprovalPartition approvalPartition)
        Returns true if the given partition has been configured to allow any administrator to approve it.
        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - the approval partition.
        Returns:
        true if any admin is allowed

      • getAllowedRoleNames

        List<String> getAllowedRoleNames​(ApprovalPartition approvalPartition)
        Returns the list of roles which have been configured in the given partition to be allowed to approve it.
        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - the approval partition.
        Returns:
        list of names of administrator roles. May return an empty list if canAnyoneApprovePartition returns true.

      • getHiddenProperties

        Set<String> getHiddenProperties()
        Returns:
        a set of properties to hide at the approval screen.

      • getReadOnlyProperties

        Set<String> getReadOnlyProperties()
        Returns:
        a set of properties to display as read-only on the approval screen

      • isNotificationEnabled

        boolean isNotificationEnabled​(ApprovalPartition approvalPartition)
        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - approval
        Returns:
        true if notifications is configured in the specified partition

                                            String body)

        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - approval
        recipient - recip
        sender - sender
        subject - subject
        body - body
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - approval
        Returns:
        updated approval

      • isUserNotificationEnabled

        boolean isUserNotificationEnabled​(ApprovalPartition approvalPartition)
        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - approval
        Returns:
        true if notifications to the end user is configured in the specified partition

                                                String sender,
                                                String subject,
                                                String body)
        Add user notification properties
        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - approval
        sender - sender
        subject - subject
        body - body
        Returns:
        updated approval

        ApprovalPartition removeUserNotificationProperties​(ApprovalPartition approvalPartition)
        Remove user notification properties
        Parameters:
        approvalPartition - approval
        Returns:
        updated approval

      • isPropertyPredefined

        boolean isPropertyPredefined​(int stepIdentifier,
                             int partitionIdentifier,
                             String propertyName)
        Allows for querying a partition of a certain property was defined procedurally.
        Parameters:
        stepIdentifier - the identifier of the step
        partitionIdentifier - the identifier of the partition
        propertyName - the name of the property
        Returns:
        true if the property is considered predefined.

      • getNumberOfApprovalsRequired

        int getNumberOfApprovalsRequired​(int stepIdentifier,
                                 int partitionIdentifier)
        Parameters:
        stepIdentifier - Step
        partitionIdentifier - Partition
        Returns:
        the number of required approvals of the specified partition. Defaults to 1.

      • getRemainingApprovalsInPartition

        int getRemainingApprovalsInPartition​(Collection<Approval> approvalsPerformed,
                                     int stepIdentifier,
                                     int partitionIdentifier)
        Return the number of required approvals of the specified partition that have not yet been approved
        Parameters:
        approvalsPerformed - a collection of performed approvals
        stepIdentifier - the ID of the step to check in
        partitionIdentifier - the ID of the partition to check in
        Returns:
        the number of required approvals of the specified partition that has not yet been approved, or ApprovalDataVO.STATUS_EXECUTIONDENIED (-7) if partition has been denied.

      • updateCAIds

        boolean updateCAIds​(int fromId,
                    int toId,
                    String toSubjectDN)
        Updates any references to a CA's CAId and Subject DN. Approval Profiles can contain CA Id references in the list of allowed roles of the steps.
        Parameters:
        fromId - Old CA Id to replace.
        toId - New CA Id to replace with.
        toSubjectDN - New CA Subject DN.
        Returns:
        True if the approval profile was changed. If so it should be persisted to the database.

      • getStepList

        List<ApprovalStep> getStepList()
        Retrieve a list of all steps which must be completed before an approval request is approved.
        Returns:
        a list of all steps in this approval profile
